relation: Joe Smith starts the inning for the Indians.
Brandon Inge singled to center. Runner on first with none out and Dusty Ryan due up.
Pinch-Hitter Gerald Laird sacrifice bunt to third. Runner on second with one out and Adam Everett due up.
Adam Everett flied out to center. Runner on third with two outs and Curtis Granderson due up.
Tony Sipp enters the game for the Indians with a runner on third and two outs.
Curtis Granderson struck out swinging to end the inning.
